DIFFERENT) bio.tools/rapid | Reporting stAndards for research in PedIatric Dentistry (RAPID) | Rapid Research in pediatric Dentistry | "Reporting standards for research in Pediatric Dentistry" (RAPID) is an initiative that provides evidence-based recommendations to improve the reporting quality of research in Pediatric Dentistry. The RAPID statement facilitates complete and transparent reporting by minimizing biases arising from incomplete or inadequate reporting of studies in Pediatric Dentistry
